dpca.text:
DPCA (Digital Publishing Central Asia) is a company
located in Almaty, Kazakhstan, which provides digital services
to support scientific publications in Central Asian countries.
The company was created to simplify the process of publishing
scientific articles and journals and ensure their compliance with
international requirements
